{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Center Executive",
  "description": "Vivo&nbsp;Nigeria (Bhai Zheng Devices) is a subsidiary of vivo; the producers of vivo smartphones ranked among the top 5 smartphones across the world. The company launched in Nigeria in 2019 and has been distributing vivo smartphones across Nigeria since then. At vivo, we commit ourselves to one thing, do the right things, and do things right. We stick to openness and honesty; we promote self-reflection and mutual respect. We strive to provide an inclusive and harmonious working environment that encourages new ideas and promotes ownership, where our viewers&nbsp;can perform at their peak and reach their potential beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Data Center Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria

Role Description


	The Data Center Executive is a full-time, on-site role located in Nigeria Lagos .
	The successful candidate will oversee the daily operations of the data center, including monitoring and maintaining systems, ensuring data security, troubleshooting technical issues, and managing hardware and software.
	They will play a vital role in ensuring efficient and seamless data processing, storage, and retrieval, collaborating with IT teams to support seamless operations.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
	Technical proficiency in system administration, data processing, and IT troubleshooting
	Experience with database management, data storage solutions, and network infrastructure
	Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills
	Knowledge of data security protocols and compliance standards
	Strong communication and collaboration skills for working with teams and stakeholders
	Ability to work effectively in on-site environments and under a structured schedule
	Prior experience in a data center or IT operations role is an asset.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-17",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-18",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "VIvo"
    
  },

       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

Data Center Executive Job at Vivo Nigeria




        
    

        
        Vivo Nigeria (Bhai Zheng Devices) is a subsidiary of vivo; the producers of vivo smartphones ranked among the top 5 smartphones across the world. The company launched in Nigeria in 2019 and has been distributing vivo smartphones across Nigeria since then. At vivo, we commit ourselves to one thing, do the right things, and do things right. We stick to openness and honesty; we promote self-reflection and mutual respect. We strive to provide an inclusive and harmonious working environment that encourages new ideas and promotes ownership, where our viewers can perform at their peak and reach their potential beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Center Executive
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Nigeria

Role Description


	The Data Center Executive is a full-time, on-site role located in Nigeria Lagos .
	The successful candidate will oversee the daily operations of the data center, including monitoring and maintaining systems, ensuring data security, troubleshooting technical issues, and managing hardware and software.
	They will play a vital role in ensuring efficient and seamless data processing, storage, and retrieval, collaborating with IT teams to support seamless operations.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
	Technical proficiency in system administration, data processing, and IT troubleshooting
	Experience with database management, data storage solutions, and network infrastructure
	Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills
	Knowledge of data security protocols and compliance standards
	Strong communication and collaboration skills for working with teams and stakeholders
	Ability to work effectively in on-site environments and under a structured schedule
	Prior experience in a data center or IT operations role is an asset.
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support)",
  "description": "Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems &amp; Services Limited is a wholly Nigerian Company specialized in the sales, marketing, distribution, installation, startup and maintenance of various equipment in Nigeria Industries and Institutions. Our wide product selection allows us to offer various expert solutions which, when aligned with our strategy focuses on driving results, developing people, critical thinking, continual improvement &amp; innovation, collaboration &amp; teamwork and customer focus &ndash; guarantee the satisfaction of the needs of our clients. We see partnership as the foundation of our entire business rather than just a fancy word. This is what differentiates us. Therefore, we are committed to providing total solutions to all your demands.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support)
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support) provides high-quality customer service and on-site support during exhibitions, trade shows, and events.
	This role ensures visitors, exhibitors, and stakeholders receive timely assistance, accurate information, and a positive overall experience.
	Candidates should have 1&ndash;5 years of customer service or event support experience, preferably in exhibitions, retail, or hospitality environments.


Key Responsibilities
Exhibition &amp; On-Site Support:


	Serve as the primary point of contact for exhibitors and visitors during exhibitions or events.
	Assist with registration, check-ins, booth assignments, and general event inquiries.
	Support exhibitors with setup guidance, operational information, and troubleshooting.


Customer Service Delivery:


	Respond to customer inquiries through phone, email, or in person with professionalism and efficiency.
	Provide accurate information about exhibition schedules, policies, activities, and logistics.
	Handle complaints or issues from participants and escalate when necessary.


Coordination &amp; Administration:


	Work closely with the exhibition operations team to ensure smooth event execution.
	Prepare and distribute event materials, badges, passes, and documentation.
	Assist in coordinating exhibitor lists, appointment schedules, and feedback forms.


On-Site Issue Management:


	Monitor exhibition areas for attendee flow, safety, and service quality.
	Resolve minor on-site issues (e.g., location inquiries, directional guidance, service requests).
	Coordinate with security, technical, or facility teams for escalated issues.


Post-Exhibition Activities:


	Collect and compile visitor and exhibitor feedback.
	Assist with reporting, evaluations, and documentation for post-event debriefings.
	Support follow-up communication and service requests after the exhibition ends.


Required Skills &amp; Qualifications


	1&ndash;5 years of experience in customer service, events support, hospitality, or related areas.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills; confident interacting with diverse groups.
	Ability to remain calm and professional in high-traffic or fast-paced environments.
	Strong problem-solving abilities with a customer-centric mindset.
	Basic administrative and computer skills (MS Office, email, CRM tools).
	Ability to work flexible hours during exhibitions (including weekends or extended hours).
	Business Administration, Operations Management, or related field (preferred but not required).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;hr@etconanalytical.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-29",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems & Services Limited"
    
  },

Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support) Job at Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems & Services Limited




        
    

        
        Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems & Services Limited is a wholly Nigerian Company specialized in the sales, marketing, distribution, installation, startup and maintenance of various equipment in Nigeria Industries and Institutions. Our wide product selection allows us to offer various expert solutions which, when aligned with our strategy focuses on driving results, developing people, critical thinking, continual improvement & innovation, collaboration & teamwork and customer focus – guarantee the satisfaction of the needs of our clients. We see partnership as the foundation of our entire business rather than just a fancy word. This is what differentiates us. Therefore, we are committed to providing total solutions to all your demands.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support)
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Customer Service Representative (Exhibition Support) provides high-quality customer service and on-site support during exhibitions, trade shows, and events.
	This role ensures visitors, exhibitors, and stakeholders receive timely assistance, accurate information, and a positive overall experience.
	Candidates should have 1–5 years of customer service or event support experience, preferably in exhibitions, retail, or hospitality environments.


Key Responsibilities
Exhibition & On-Site Support:


	Serve as the primary point of contact for exhibitors and visitors during exhibitions or events.
	Assist with registration, check-ins, booth assignments, and general event inquiries.
	Support exhibitors with setup guidance, operational information, and troubleshooting.


Customer Service Delivery:


	Respond to customer inquiries through phone, email, or in person with professionalism and efficiency.
	Provide accurate information about exhibition schedules, policies, activities, and logistics.
	Handle complaints or issues from participants and escalate when necessary.


Coordination & Administration:


	Work closely with the exhibition operations team to ensure smooth event execution.
	Prepare and distribute event materials, badges, passes, and documentation.
	Assist in coordinating exhibitor lists, appointment schedules, and feedback forms.


On-Site Issue Management:


	Monitor exhibition areas for attendee flow, safety, and service quality.
	Resolve minor on-site issues (e.g., location inquiries, directional guidance, service requests).
	Coordinate with security, technical, or facility teams for escalated issues.


Post-Exhibition Activities:


	Collect and compile visitor and exhibitor feedback.
	Assist with reporting, evaluations, and documentation for post-event debriefings.
	Support follow-up communication and service requests after the exhibition ends.


Required Skills & Qualifications


	1–5 years of experience in customer service, events support, hospitality, or related areas.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills; confident interacting with diverse groups.
	Ability to remain calm and professional in high-traffic or fast-paced environments.
	Strong problem-solving abilities with a customer-centric mindset.
	Basic administrative and computer skills (MS Office, email, CRM tools).
	Ability to work flexible hours during exhibitions (including weekends or extended hours).
	Business Administration, Operations Management, or related field (preferred but not required).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: hr@etconanalytical.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "The Abuja Electricity Distribution Company (AEDC Plc) is a reputable Electricity Distribution Company in Nigeria backed by international investors and shareholders.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Operational Control Manager

Job Location: Abuja

Role Overview


	The Operational Control Manager will oversee the efficiency, integrity, and compliance of AEDC&#39;s daily operations.
	The role includes developing control frameworks, monitoring performance, improving processes, and ensuring adherence to company and regulatory standards.
	This position drives operational excellence and supports cross-department collaboration.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, implement, and maintain an operational control framework aligned with company strategy and compliance standards.
	Monitor and evaluate daily operations to ensure efficiency, reliability, and adherence to internal controls.
	Conduct operational risk assessments to identify weaknesses and recommend corrective measures.
	Develop and report on Key Performance
	Indicators (KPIs) and Key Risk Indicators (KRIS) to track performance and control effectiveness.coordinate process audits, control testing, and performance reviews across business units.
	Ensure compliance with internal policies, regulatory standards, and health, safety, and environmental (HSE) requirements.
	Lead process improvement initiatives aimed at optimizing productivity, reducing operational losses, and enhancing service quality.
	Collaborate with Finance, Risk, Internal Audit, and Operations teams to align control activities with business priorities.
	Prepare operational reports and present findings to Management for decision-making.
	Train and guide operational teams on control procedures, compliance expectations, and best practices.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Minimum of a Bachelor&#39;s Degree or its equivalent in relevant fields such as: Accounting, Finance, Economics, Business Administration, Electrical Engineering or any related field
	At least 10 years of post NYSC working experience.
	Must be accredited by at least one of these professional bodies.i.e. Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN); Association of Chartered Certified Accountants; Certified Internal Auditor (CIA).
	Experience in utilities or energy sector auditing, preferably in electricity distribution.
	Strong understanding of regulatory frameworks, operational risk, and asset management in power utilities.
	Must have a deep understanding of auditing standards, corporate ethics, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent analytical, investigative, and reporting skills.

Operational Control Manager Job at Abuja Electricity Distribution Company




        
    

        
        The Abuja Electricity Distribution Company (AEDC Plc) is a reputable Electricity Distribution Company in Nigeria backed by international investors and shareholders.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operational Control Manager

Job Location: Abuja

Role Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Operational Control Manager will oversee the efficiency, integrity, and compliance of AEDC's daily operations.
	The role includes developing control frameworks, monitoring performance, improving processes, and ensuring adherence to company and regulatory standards.
	This position drives operational excellence and supports cross-department collaboration.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, implement, and maintain an operational control framework aligned with company strategy and compliance standards.
	Monitor and evaluate daily operations to ensure efficiency, reliability, and adherence to internal controls.
	Conduct operational risk assessments to identify weaknesses and recommend corrective measures.
	Develop and report on Key Performance
	Indicators (KPIs) and Key Risk Indicators (KRIS) to track performance and control effectiveness.coordinate process audits, control testing, and performance reviews across business units.
	Ensure compliance with internal policies, regulatory standards, and health, safety, and environmental (HSE) requirements.
	Lead process improvement initiatives aimed at optimizing productivity, reducing operational losses, and enhancing service quality.
	Collaborate with Finance, Risk, Internal Audit, and Operations teams to align control activities with business priorities.
	Prepare operational reports and present findings to Management for decision-making.
	Train and guide operational teams on control procedures, compliance expectations, and best practices.


Qualifications & Experience


	Minimum of a Bachelor's Degree or its equivalent in relevant fields such as: Accounting, Finance, Economics, Business Administration, Electrical Engineering or any related field
	At least 10 years of post NYSC working experience.
	Must be accredited by at least one of these professional bodies.i.e. Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN); Association of Chartered Certified Accountants; Certified Internal Auditor (CIA).
	Experience in utilities or energy sector auditing, preferably in electricity distribution.
	Strong understanding of regulatory frameworks, operational risk, and asset management in power utilities.
	Must have a deep understanding of auditing standards, corporate ethics, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent analytical, investigative, and reporting skills.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Full Stack Developer",
  "description": "JobMerge - Our client is seeking a skilled candidate&nbsp;to contribute to an innovative SaaS auction marketplace project in the capacity below:

Job Position: Full Stack Developer
Job Location:&nbsp;Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Description


	Are you a passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on back-end development?
	Do you have a minimum of 3 years of experience and the ability to work fully remote? If so, this opportunity is for you!
	The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of MySQL, Laravel, and experience with payment solutions.


Responsibilities


	Write and maintain clean, scalable code for server-side web application logic, APIs, and services.
	Design, integrate, and manage databases, ensuring secure and optimized data storage and retrieval.
	Work closely with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration of UI/UX elements with server-side logic.
	Develop and maintain APIs for data exchange between the front-end and back-end systems.
	Implement security measures to protect data and application functionality, including user authentication, authorization, and encryption.
	Monitor and improve application performance, ensuring responsiveness and speed, particularly as the system scales.
	Identify, diagnose, and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks.
	Use version control tools to manage and document codebase changes.
	Automate and manage the deployment of applications to staging or production environments using DevOps practices.
	Write technical documentation for back-end processes, databases, and APIs.


Requirements


	Candidates should provide examples of past SaaS/e-commerce projects they worked on with their application
	Selected candidates will be required to commit full-time to the role for the contract duration.


Essential Skills:


	NextJs/ReactJs, PHP, Laravel, MySQL
	Extensive experience in developing e-commerce sites
	Experience in designing and building APIs, and integrating many external APIs
	Knowledge of e-commerce systems, payment gateways, and CRM APIs integration
	Knowledge of AWS DevOps and cloud services
	Familiarity with DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud platforms (AWS preferably, Google Cloud)
	Understands software development i.e. coding standards, testing methodologies, and deployment strategies
	Understands agile methodologies, version control systems, and development frameworks
	Understands security standards, including data protection and encryption techniques.
	Has good communication and collaboration skills.


Optional but beneficial skills:


	Laravel schedule &amp; queue
	Websocket with Laravel
	OpenAI API
	Youtube Analytics API
	Website Scraping
	Admin Dashboard development experience.


What&#39;s on Offer


	Salary Range &ndash;&nbsp;N350,000 &ndash; N500,000&nbsp;per month
	3 months rolling contract
	Fully Remote Working.


Note: Select&nbsp;Full Stack Developer&nbsp;on Role applied for and share your CV/Resume and portfolio of SaaS/e-commerce projects.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",

  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

    }
  }
}



Full Stack Developer Job at JobMerge




        
    

        
        JobMerge - Our client is seeking a skilled candidate to contribute to an innovative SaaS auction marketplace project in the capacity below:

Job Position: Full Stack Developer
Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Are you a passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on back-end development?
	Do you have a minimum of 3 years of experience and the ability to work fully remote? If so, this opportunity is for you!
	The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of MySQL, Laravel, and experience with payment solutions.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Write and maintain clean, scalable code for server-side web application logic, APIs, and services.
	Design, integrate, and manage databases, ensuring secure and optimized data storage and retrieval.
	Work closely with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration of UI/UX elements with server-side logic.
	Develop and maintain APIs for data exchange between the front-end and back-end systems.
	Implement security measures to protect data and application functionality, including user authentication, authorization, and encryption.
	Monitor and improve application performance, ensuring responsiveness and speed, particularly as the system scales.
	Identify, diagnose, and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks.
	Use version control tools to manage and document codebase changes.
	Automate and manage the deployment of applications to staging or production environments using DevOps practices.
	Write technical documentation for back-end processes, databases, and APIs.


Requirements


	Candidates should provide examples of past SaaS/e-commerce projects they worked on with their application
	Selected candidates will be required to commit full-time to the role for the contract duration.


Essential Skills:


	NextJs/ReactJs, PHP, Laravel, MySQL
	Extensive experience in developing e-commerce sites
	Experience in designing and building APIs, and integrating many external APIs
	Knowledge of e-commerce systems, payment gateways, and CRM APIs integration
	Knowledge of AWS DevOps and cloud services
	Familiarity with DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud platforms (AWS preferably, Google Cloud)
	Understands software development i.e. coding standards, testing methodologies, and deployment strategies
	Understands agile methodologies, version control systems, and development frameworks
	Understands security standards, including data protection and encryption techniques.
	Has good communication and collaboration skills.


Optional but beneficial skills:


	Laravel schedule & queue
	Websocket with Laravel
	OpenAI API
	Youtube Analytics API
	Website Scraping
	Admin Dashboard development experience.


What's on Offer


	Salary Range – N350,000 – N500,000 per month
	3 months rolling contract
	Fully Remote Working.


Note: Select Full Stack Developer on Role applied for and share your CV/Resume and portfolio of SaaS/e-commerce projects.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable Dental Clinic, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Receptionist, you will be responsible for delivering exceptional front-desk service by attending to patients, managing appointments, handling enquiries, and ensuring a smooth and welcoming experience for all visitors.


Responsibilities


	Welcome and attend to patients and visitors in a friendly and professional manner.
	Manage front-desk operations including check-in, check-out, and appointment scheduling.
	Handle phone calls, enquiries, and messages promptly and accurately.
	Maintain patient records and ensure all information is properly updated and confidential.
	Coordinate patient flow to ensure smooth clinic operations.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND/HND/BSC in any relevant field with a minimum of 1 years of experience as a receptionist or customer service personnel (healthcare experience is an added advantage).
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent organizational abilities and attention to detail.
	Proficiency in computer applications (MS Office, scheduling software, etc.).


Salary
NGN150,000 - NGN200,000 / Month (Net)",

Receptionist Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable Dental Clinic, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Receptionist, you will be responsible for delivering exceptional front-desk service by attending to patients, managing appointments, handling enquiries, and ensuring a smooth and welcoming experience for all visitors.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Welcome and attend to patients and visitors in a friendly and professional manner.
	Manage front-desk operations including check-in, check-out, and appointment scheduling.
	Handle phone calls, enquiries, and messages promptly and accurately.
	Maintain patient records and ensure all information is properly updated and confidential.
	Coordinate patient flow to ensure smooth clinic operations.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND/HND/BSC in any relevant field with a minimum of 1 years of experience as a receptionist or customer service personnel (healthcare experience is an added advantage).
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent organizational abilities and attention to detail.
	Proficiency in computer applications (MS Office, scheduling software, etc.).


Salary
NGN150,000 - NGN200,000 / Month (Net)
